name: blue vs red (ricardoGames)
description:
blue vs red is a fun game made in under 4 hours it is a two player game u can play with friends or family were you both have guns and have to shoot each other the person with the most points wins I hope yo like this game and if you do pleas consider playing bullet hell my best game. blue vs red is a free game but if you want you can donate or check out my other games ir just tell a friend I hope you enjoy blue vs red

note the collision detection  is SHIT and you might clip out of the walls if this happens reset the game ( :
